item.title: Art Design｜Vacuum Flourescent Display
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Merging engineering and art has always been my dream. Using my engineering experience in robot design and manufacturing, I designed a clock that was displayed using a vacuum fluorescent display（VFD）tube

item.title: Art Design｜Gem Clock Necklace
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Merging engineering and art has always been my dream. Using my engineering experience in manufacturing, I designed a necklace in SOLIDWORKS using old Seiko mechanical watch movements, gemstones, Ag925 silver necklace and SLA and SLM 3D printed parts
